Package it.polimi.se2018.controller

Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2018.controller.Controller
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Observer<MessageVC>

    public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
implements Observer<MessageVC>
    class Controller contains all method for the manage of the game
    Author:
    Samuele Guida
